attributes.action: C.S.A using child tax credit as income for calculating how much should be paid
attributes.additional_details: The C.S.A use child tax credit  as income when deciding how much an N.R.P should pay to a parent with care, so in effect they take money from one child to give to another.  I would like the goverment to change the way C.S.A calculate income and not use child tax credit. I think this is very unfair so I am asking for people to please back this petition
